channel.title: Notes on Call me how
channel.description: Recent content in Notes on Call me how

item.title: Study Skills
item.description: Study Skills How to Study more Effectively and Efficiently PURPOSE While Singapore’s education is very holistic in terms of the subjects that is taught, the education system fails to teach students how to be a better learner and study better. This guide is not a holy grail, but an individual’s experience and culmination of knowledge and strategies developed through my years of study. Overview Learning Science Time Management Notes Making Classroom lessons Exam Mugging Sessions Exam Strategies 1) Learning Science 1.
